name: ALIEN GARDEN
description:
In the near future, a team of scientists in search of a new planet discover a plethora of strange structures. On closer inspection, they are in fact huge gardens built and long abandoned by aliens. A team is set up to study one of the planets. Once there, they received an unexpected visit.

Inspired by Minecraft, Terraria and Realm of the Mad God.

Early Bird Notice

Please keep in mind that this is a very early build of the game and server stability is not guaranteed!
